[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@3rdweb/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [DropErc721Module](./sdk.droperc721module.md)

## DropErc721Module class

Setup a collection of one-of-one NFTs that are minted as users claim them.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class DropErc721Module 
```

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@3rdweb/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const module = sdk.getDropModule("{{module_address}}");
```

|  [(constructor)(network, address, options)](./sdk.droperc721module._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DropErc721Module</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balance()](./sdk.droperc721module.balance.md) |  | Get NFT Balance for the currently connected wallet |
|  [balanceOf(address)](./sdk.droperc721module.balanceof.md) |  | Get NFT Balance |
|  [createBatch(metadatas)](./sdk.droperc721module.createbatch.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Create batch allows you to create a batch of tokens in one transaction. This function can only be called once per module at the moment. |
|  [get(tokenId)](./sdk.droperc721module.get.md) |  | Get a single NFT Metadata |
|  [getActiveClaimCondition()](./sdk.droperc721module.getactiveclaimcondition.md) |  | Get the currently active claim condition in this Drop |
|  [getAll(queryParams)](./sdk.droperc721module.getall.md) |  | Get All NFTs |
|  [getAllClaimConditions()](./sdk.droperc721module.getallclaimconditions.md) |  | Get all the claim conditions associated with this Drop |
|  [getAllClaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.droperc721module.getallclaimed.md) |  | Get All Claimed NFTs |
|  [getAllUnclaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.droperc721module.getallunclaimed.md) |  | Get All Unclaimed NFTs |
|  [getOwned(\_address)](./sdk.droperc721module.getowned.md) |  | Get Owned NFTs |
|  [getPrimarySaleRecipient()](./sdk.droperc721module.getprimarysalerecipient.md) |  | Get the primary sale recipient. |
|  [isApproved(address, operator)](./sdk.droperc721module.isapproved.md) |  | Get whether this wallet has approved transfers from the given operator |
|  [ownerOf(tokenId)](./sdk.droperc721module.ownerof.md) |  | Get the current owner of a given NFT within this Drop |
|  [setApproval(operator, approved)](./sdk.droperc721module.setapproval.md) |  | Approve or remove operator as an operator for the caller. Operators can call transferFrom or safeTransferFrom for any token owned by the caller. |
|  [totalClaimedSupply()](./sdk.droperc721module.totalclaimedsupply.md) |  | Get the claimed supply for this Drop. |
|  [totalSupply()](./sdk.droperc721module.totalsupply.md) |  | Get the total supply for this Drop. |
|  [totalUnclaimedSupply()](./sdk.droperc721module.totalunclaimedsupply.md) |  | Get the unclaimed supply for this Drop. |
|  [transfer(to, tokenId)](./sdk.droperc721module.transfer.md) |  | Transfer NFT |
